name: Essential CFD Libraries
description: This series explores a collection of libraries that will make writing CFD solver easier, faster, and more fun.

01_eigen-the-swiss-arm-knife-of-cfd-libr.heading: Eigen: The Swiss Army Knife of CFD libraries
01_eigen-the-swiss-arm-knife-of-cfd-libr.description: Eigen is a linear algebra library that supports matrix and vector operations, which will help you write cleaner and more performant CFD solvers.
